p.s: In the following I am going to comment on the thesethesis: The CPS should have taken Pearl away from Margot and the trailer park, put her into a foster home and help her to get a good education and prepare for a better and independent way of life.
At first my opinion is Pearl should not have been taken by the CPSChild Protective Services to a foster home.
An argument for this thesethesis is that Pearl maybe could achieve a better life and live in a house with furniture like she wished it.
She could get troughthrough the final exams at school and study something, she also could meet new people and marry someone.
Putting Pearl into a foster home could change her life compleatelycompletely to something good and something different from the trailer park too.

Through putting her into a foster home she could achieve her own American Dream, for example she could find a well paid job, buy a home with furniture and maybe marry somtime, so this life would be all in all a much better life than living in a Ford Mercury next to a garbage dump at a trailer park in the landscape of Florida, but Pearl could also end up like Helen, changing from foster home to foster home and slowly dieingdying inside.
The chance to get stuck at foster homes is much higher than the chance to get out of a foster home and achieve the American Dream.
If you get stuck at foster homes, you will not get out that easily and independent, because you have to work really hard and doing this in a foster home is nearly impossible.
If you get stuck you also can end up like Helen, not knowing after years who your family is and also getting a mental illness because of the bad treatening.
Another point against the thesethesis is Margot.
Would it be ethically correct to take a daughter away from her mother, who ran away from home to protect just this daughter.
Margot threw her life away to give Pearl a better life than she had, so taking Pearl away from Margot wouldn't be ethically correct for me.
One consequence of this would maybe be the selfmurdering of Margot because Pearl is her only sencesense of livelife.
